q: Idol is much more fun without Simon Cowell , insists Nigel Lythgoe .`` Nasty'' Nigel Lythgoe , 61, back on the show as executive producer, reckons more wannabe singers have turned up. He added: There isn't the fear that there was of the embarrassment of singing in front of Simon Cowell .`` I think you'll see a lot more fun this year.
